product_name: Salomon Skin Pro 10+3 Set Hydration Pack
long_description: Stay hydrated on your next trail run with the formfitting Salomon Skin Pro 10+3 Set Hydration pack. Includes a 50 fl. oz. (1.5 liter) Hydrapak(R) hydration reservoir so you can quickly satisfy your thirst; reservoir is phthalate free, PVC free and BPA free. Drink tube routes under your right arm and the bite valve is held in place for easy access while you're running; on/off switch on the bite valve prevents leaks. SensiFit construction uses stretchy fabrics to allow the pack to conform to your body for a good fit and great stability while you're on the go. Zippered main compartment is large enough to hold an extra layer of clothing and some food. 2 stretchy pockets on the shoulder straps hold small items close by. Stretch pocket on the left side is sized to fit bike water bottles. Dual sternum straps keep the pack secure without applying pressure to your chest; sternum straps can be adjusted. Mesh on the back panel helps move moisture away from your back to keep you comfortable on the trail. Large opening on top of the hydration reservoir makes it easy to fill; flip the reservoir inside out for easy cleaning. Quick-disconnect valve lets you easily remove the drink tube when you want to clean the reservoir. Removable insulated sleeve for the reservoir helps keep your beverage cool on hot days. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light. The Salomon Salomon Skin Pro 10+3 Set Hydration pack features a zippered front pocket for stashing small items.
short_description: Stay hydrated on your next trail run with the formfitting Salomon Skin Pro 10+3 Set Hydration pack.
